page.title: 03My Home In Sheffield 9
page.content: I live at Brightside on Jenkin Road. My house is about 70 years old, it was built in 1918. We've got 2 bedrooms and an attic, where I sleep. Outside in the yard is a small shed. In the kitchen stands a washing machine, tumble drier, cooker, fridge- freezer, sink unit, lots of cupboards and a work top too. The bathroom has a toilet, bath and sink plus a shampoo and talc cupboard. Inside the living room is a three piece suite, glass cupboard, colour TV video cabinet, stereo unit and a gas fire. We eat our meals sitting on benches at the dining room table. From my attic window I can see Tinsley Viaduct and derelict factories. After school I play with my sister and friends in our yard, or cross the road either to the Rec. playground or Castledine Gardens.
